discourse_list.title: EIP-2622 Replace Difficulty with Total Difficulty in block headers

content.content: As in the topic - replace Difficulty with Total Difficulty in Block Headers. This will help stateless clients (and any clients) to verify headers without full path to genesis. This will help to pick best peers by quickly discarding fake total difficulty claims. This will help with AddBlock messages validation.
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes to replace the "Difficulty" parameter with "Total Difficulty" in block headers to improve the verification process for stateless clients and to quickly discard fake total difficulty claims. The proposal is explained in the post, and constructive criticism and auditing are welcomed.
